Author: nnlssthrpl
Text: i’d actually see this as an absolute win, you gave it a go and even my normal family members don’t always finish meals at restaurants. Don’t beat yourself up you’re doing amazing bby

Author: elegant-situation
Text: Even if it didn’t go 100% perfectly, you went out there and did something scary and you should feel proud!! You also now have some learning points for how to hopefully make next time go a little smoother. One idea would maybe be to ask for another plate and split off a serving that feels more comfortable and then see how you feel.  If nothing else, I’m proud of you for giving this a go and I wish you luck on future tries!
